venue.address_2: Exit 5A off Rt 128/93 in strip mall on left across from Comfort Inn
venue.name: Dunkin Donuts Randolph

item.description:
Lynn Trotta will be leading a backroads ride around southern RI.

Sue C will lead us to meet Lynn at Hot Leather, 90 Newport Ave, Rumford, RI.

(Lynn will be giving us info on the RI tunnel at that point and where you can get your "ticket"...........and perhaps I can sell some of you some swamp land in Florida as well...........LOL)

*******************************

Meeting Location: Randolph Dunkin Donuts
Meeting Time: 8 am to leave at 830 am.

***********************************
Hi - We will meet at Hot Leathers
90 Newport Ave
East Providence, RI 02916
401-435-6346
at 9:30 am. I will take us down to the beach on back roads. 123 West to 116 South, to 14 West, to 14a, to 49 South. On 49 South we will stop for coffee, snack, bathroom etc.. at The Brown Cow Cafe. We will continue on a scenic ride to Aunt Carries. They have a window where we can get clam cakes and chowder. After George's I will lead you guys out by scenic 1a north. I did this ride yesterday, and it was a little over 100 miles from Hot Leathers. It is a nice ride - very scenic, rural roads. And there is a tunnel on 14 west, but no-one will need a ticket because you won't be coming out the other the end.

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Ticket to Ride
